item.title: Getting Started in Cyber Security
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: A comprehensive Australian guide to breaking into cybersecurity, covering red vs blue team paths, practical skills development, certifications, programming projects, and government career opportunities.
